page.title: 15Recreation - Hittisleigh
page.content: In this area recreation is mainly of a social nature, with everyone taking part. Good use is made of the Village Hall for many of these activities. Keen gardeners hold twice-yearly produce shows, 1 in Spring which incorporates many crafts, and one in Summer which includes cookery. An Annual Fun Night is held in August. There are social evenings for young and old, and table-tennis for all age groups during winter. The ladies have a club which meets monthly, and a New Year Dinner. There is a Charity Evening & Barbecue at Medlake, and a Village Outing annually. Many seek recreation in spinning and weaving, others in gardening. In Autumn there is a Harvest Supper, and the Minister at the local chapel holds a Missionary Night and regular Bible Class.
